Text: Re Three for Threenot a promise but it more or less went like this Kathy Lavo you have caused me a lot of grief by taking both Ryan and Chad you wouldnt believe the overtime I had to work I should get some kind of hiring bonus or something John Well if you go three for three youre on I have read that the average cost of hiringtraining someone is approx I am willing to accept much less than this Actually I dont really expect anything I just thought I would give it a shot Kathy From John J NRON on AM CST To Kathy CT cc Subject Re Three for Three In all seriousness did I promise you a payment

Re Three for Threenot a promise but it more or less went like this Kathy Lavo you have caused me a lot of grief by taking both Ryan and Chad you wouldnt believe the overtime I had to work I should get some kind of hiring bonus or something John Well if you go three for three youre on I have read that the average cost of hiringtraining someone is approx I am willing to accept much less than this Actually I dont really expect anything I just thought I would give it a shot Kathy From John J NRON on AM CST To Kathy CT cc Subject Re Three for Three In all seriousness did I promise you a payment
Canada Sithe MTMPST This is an excel type summary of the calcs that may help explain the deals Kathy Please call me at home this weekend if you need me to come in

Enron Direct Canada Gas book Cc We intend to start officializing a gas book for our Enron Direct business starting July rd From this officialized book credit VAR cashflows and positions can be pulled It will be a relatively flat book because every deal with a rd party has been backed with our trading desk The name of the book in FTCANDDIRECT There will be a consolidated price and basis book and an index book The portfolio code is The currrent MTM of the portfolio is approx M USD and is comprised of about different counterparties The positions and VAR should be reported under McKay Kathy Please call if you have any questions

Currency Issues MemoPlease review the attached fx memo I have prepared Can every body meet Monday June th at pm to go over it This is the memo that we are going to give to the doorstep auditors and it will also provide me guidance as to the way to proceed in solving our fx issues Kathy

RE Final May pl Cc PST Brad Your numbers look fine See the attached recon Kathy Original Message From Jones Brad Sent Wednesday June AM To Reeves Kathy Subject FW Final May pl Original Message From Jones Brad Sent Tuesday June PM To Reeves Kathy Subject Final May pl Kathy attached is the final may numbers I have for each of your traders File Canada finalsxls Let me know if you have any questions Thanks Brad Jones

RE gas bookPST Cooper The name of your book is FTCNDPWRDT I am not sure how to get your eol account linked to it but I think Bill would know Kathy Original Message From Richey Cooper Sent Tuesday August AM To Reeves Kathy Subject gas book can you let me know when the gas book is setup and if i need to do anything to get my eol account linked to it cooper
Canadas PL Cc what I have for Canadas pl for January Can you let me know what you reported so that we can make sure that it is the same Kathy

Re Canada pl M was to have been reduced from our Q trading income to break out the origination correctly It looks like this was never done in your report I thought it had been based on previous Emails I dont think the pl in your report is correct as it is M too high This is what our trading income at Dec should be Note the DPR was never adjusted because the LTD and YTD numbers do not exclude orgination income It also looks like the break out by trader is not quite right Kathy Robin Rodrigue AM To Kathy CT cc Subject Re Canada pl Kathy I am attaching a copy of the NGPL that was reported as of this morning If you look at the by Trader PL we are off from your spreadsheet by approximately million USD for December and approximately million year to date The consists of the December variance and the million variance that we discussed earlier originations However I spoke with the Chris Able from the Controls group what we are reporting for originations and for Canadian pl ties to the DPR This leads me to believe that either our number already includes the origination adjustment or the origination adjustment was never made to the DPR To help resolve the December variance I have added a tab to your file to show what we have reported each day for December Remember the pl we are reporting by trader excludes originations Give me a call when you have time and we can try to resolve these variances Thanks Robin Kathy Reeves PM To Robin CT cc Subject Canada pl Robin I would like to make sure before year end that the pl being reporting for Canada trading profits only equals what I think it is as per attached Would you let me know what you are currently reporting for Canada Thanks Kathy

Re Consolidated Canadian PL by MonthPlease see the reconcilation I have prepared Our primary difference seems to be with the first quarter It may have something to do with origination During Q I had Q restated so that the pl was did not include orginated income The pl numbers that you have provided seem to include originated income Kathy Robin Rodrigue PM To Kathy CT cc Subject Re Consolidated Canadian PL by Month July Firm July Intramonth Kathy Reeves PM To Robin CT cc Subject Re Consolidated Canadian PL by Month Robin There is a significant difference K in July Can you further break it out by intramonth and term Kathy Robin Rodrigue PM To Kathy CT cc Subject Consolidated Canadian PL by Month Here is what we reported for consolidated Canada as of Nov Listed amounts are in thousands Jun July Aug Sept Oct Nov YTD Im still working on the first half of the year Thanks Robin

Re Consolidated Canadian PL by MonthThere is a significant difference K in July Can you further break it out by intramonth and term Kathy Robin Rodrigue PM To Kathy CT cc Subject Consolidated Canadian PL by Month Here is what we reported for consolidated Canada as of Nov Listed amounts are in thousands Jun July Aug Sept Oct Nov YTD Im still working on the first half of the year Thanks Robin

ReI took a look at how the Exotics book is being pulled in and everything looks fine with the exception of the Nymex equivalency factor for AECOUS Would you be able to change the factor from to until March Thanks Kathy Robin Rodrigue PM To Kathy CT Nicole CT cc Subject Re Sorry it took so long Robin
Would you be able to send me the detail for the exotics tonight so I can look at how it is being brought in Kathy
Re Post Ids ERMS is officialRodrigue PM To Nicole CT Kathy CT cc Subject Re Post Ids ERMS is official How is the FTExotic file coming Robin
Re Canada Exoticsgood Robin Rodrigue PM To Kathy CT Nicole CT cc Subject Re Canada Exotics Here are the FT Positions including the Exotics Robin
Re FT Can Positionsgood Robin Rodrigue PM To Kathy CT cc Subject Re FT Can Positions Here are your positions including the exotics Robin

Re FT Can PositionsForwarded by Kathy ReevesCALECT on PM Kathy Reeves PM To Robin CT cc Subject Re FT Can Positions Our books are official EGSC ERMS EGSCC EGSCOP Kathy
Re FT Can Positionsbooks are official EGSC ERMS EGSCC EGSCOP Kathy

ExoticsI just have a question for item Some of the deals are multimonth deals How can I have a uniquie master deal id for each line if there is only one TAGG number for all of the months and I need to break out each month separately Kathy Robin Rodrigue PM To Kathy CT cc Subject Spreadsheet Format Kathy I spoke with the system administrators today and they gave me several more guidelines for the text files The Book ID must be an existing book Please use the same book id every day Also please Sort the Book Id by risk type ie IMCanErmsxlGDL then IMCANERMSXLPHY then IMCANERMSXLPRC The Master Deal Id must be a unique number per line The reference date must be in the following format DMMMYY MTM Value Amount must be a NUMBER If there is no position please use a zero The GROSS POSITION and DELTA POSITION must be a value No commas no dashes no links and no REF errors Again if there is no position please use a zero The guidelines apply to all text files that must be loaded into GRMS If you have any question please give me a call Thanks Robin

Re FT Can Positions Can you send me the detail on this I want to know exactly how the exotics are coming in I will look at it tomorrow These positions look fine I just want to get more precise Kathy Robin Rodrigue AM To Kathy CT cc Subject FT Can Positions Kathy Here is the FT Can Position including the Exotics file Let me know how it looks Im having trouble getting the IM position to pull in so if I dont send you a file soon just assume Ill plug the numbers to match the excel file that Brian saved in the directory Thanks Robin

Canada TXT FilesI just want to make sure that all of our txt files that I send you are being reported in the benchmarks Exotics I noticed that Canadas exotics positions were not included in the benchmark on Friday Where are they being reported Power Also are Canadas Power positions being reported now I have been sending them on a daily basis for about a week now IM Please send me what you report for IM as I want to make sure that it agrees to the excel file that I save to the Houston directory daily Kathy Forwarded by Kathy ReevesCALECT on PM Nicole LaPorte PM To Kathy CT cc Subject Re ERMS is official Post Ids Forwarded by Nicole LaPorteCALECT on PM Robin Rodrigue PM To Nicole CT cc Subject Re ERMS is official Post Ids Here are your positions and I also included the detail Let me know Thanks Robin

Exoticsnet nymex equivalent position for todays exotics portolio is contracts I changed the pubcode for the spread options from a basis curve CGPRAECOBASIS to a Fixed Price Curve AECOUS so hopefully this will help us reconcile
Canada Exotic Positionstry out the following exotics file in your system The nymex equivalent position should be contracts
Canada IM positionsare Canadas IM positions in txt format Please let me know if they work in your systems as I will be sending nightly Kathy

Re INTRACANDWESTPHY BOOK Cc I took a look at the intracandwestphy calc and there is nothing about the calc that is different from yesterday which Kam set up I took a look at the detail but it is very difficult to use because if does not tie into the summary page at all I did note the following things though You are not pulling in our CGPRAecoBasis Positions into the summary a quick look at AugSeptof Oct will show this July will NEVER tie out until systems is able to roll off th of the MI positions daily This applies to physical gas daily and Financial Please continue to use the positions we send you until we are able to tie Kathy Kathy Robin Rodrigue PM To Kathy CT Jeff CT Brian CT cc Subject INTRACANDWESTPHY BOOK Hey Guys We are still not pulling the IntraCandWestPhy book into the benchmark I have talked to the systems administrator and he thinks it might be in how the book is set up in the system I have attached below a copy of the screen that shows how we have desigated the various codes for this book Please look at this and verify that we have it set up properly If you have any questions feel free to give me a call I am also attaching the detail that I pulled out of the GRMS system Please take a look at it and help me identify what is causing our variances For instance I am pulling a position of contracts for July Price and you show a position of long contracts Thanks Robin Forwarded by Robin RodrigueHOUECT on PM Gary Stadler PM To Robin CT cc Subject

Adjustment required to Canadas PL regarding Quarter One Origination Cc a change to be made in the pl numbers that you report for Canada Quarter one needs to be retroactively restated as attached This needs to be done so as the Producer Marketing groups income is split correctly from Trading income This change needs to be reflected in all of the managment pl summaries There will be no change in the current DPR because all of the YTD and LTD numbers exclude origination I can resubmit a revised DPR for Jan Feb and Mar if this makes it easier for you This change is necessary because the same person is no longer responsible for both Origination and Trading in the Calgary office Lavorato used to be responsible for both I need this done ASAP because the commercial groups need the managment reports to reflect the correct PL for PRC purposes Please call if you have any questions Kathy

Re Intramonth Canada PositionsThe following books are missing FTCANDEGSCGPRICE FTCANDEGSCGBASIS FTCANDOPGDGDL INTRACNDBCGDGDL INTRACANDBCPHY INTRACANDWESTBASIS INTRACANDWESTPRICE INTRACANDBCBASIS INTRACANDBCPRICE Kathy Robin Rodrigue PM To Kathy CT cc Kam CT Subject Intramonth Canada Positions Kathy As you know we are trying to eliminate all the plugs on the Gas Benchmark Therefore we would like to begin pulling your positions from the GRMS system I have attached a file that shows the position that I got when I queried GRMS for the June position I have also included the detail and a copy of what you reported As you will see these positions are significantly different Please look at the detail and let me know if you see the reason for the descrepancy ie books that we have omitted Let me know if you need more information Thanks Robin

Re Canada pl M was to have been reduced from our Q trading income to break out the origination correctly It looks like this was never done in your report I thought it had been based on previous Emails I dont think the pl in your report is correct as it is M too high This is what our trading income at Dec should be Note the DPR was never adjusted because the LTD and YTD numbers do not exclude orgination income It also looks like the break out by trader is not quite right Kathy Robin Rodrigue AM To Kathy CT cc Subject Re Canada pl Kathy I am attaching a copy of the NGPL that was reported as of this morning If you look at the by Trader PL we are off from your spreadsheet by approximately million USD for December and approximately million year to date The consists of the December variance and the million variance that we discussed earlier originations However I spoke with the Chris Able from the Controls group what we are reporting for originations and for Canadian pl ties to the DPR This leads me to believe that either our number already includes the origination adjustment or the origination adjustment was never made to the DPR To help resolve the December variance I have added a tab to your file to show what we have reported each day for December Remember the pl we are reporting by trader excludes originations Give me a call when you have time and we can try to resolve these variances Thanks Robin Kathy Reeves PM To Robin CT cc Subject Canada pl Robin I would like to make sure before year end that the pl being reporting for Canada trading profits only equals what I think it is as per attached Would you let me know what you are currently reporting for Canada Thanks Kathy
